name: SliderZ (Eli Aloni)
description:
This is a Demo game .

Cool and fun sliding tiles puzzle game with various cute images .

Youtube video :


Slide the tiles by clicking them and moving them to the empty blue spot, try to match the reference image.

The Demo version doesn't support multiplayer and has a very limited number of puzzle images.

The fully operational game can be found on the Google Play Store , with hundreds of puzzle images and multiplayer support , you can play alone or compete  against your friends and family in realtime multiplayer game (at most 4 players in a game) .

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.elix22.sliderz
